COPY INTO [practicabigdatasqlbase].[dbo].[Usuarios]
FROM 'https://datalakegen2grupo11.blob.core.windows.net/datalakegen2grupo11/user/trusted-service-user/brutos/userid-profile.tsv' 
WITH  
(
FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'      
,CREDENTIAL =(IDENTITY='Shared Access Signature', SECRET='sp=r&st=2022-11-10T15:26:31Z&se=2022-11-10T23:26:31Z&spr=https&sv=2021-06-08&sr=b&sig=gR9D7JYUKWnDvZqxedrCI3b6ND9tyhV4XYK0uW6eIaE%3D') 
,FIRSTROW = 2
,ENCODING = 'UTF8'
,AUTO_CREATE_TABLE = 'ON')

/*CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT TSV
       WITH (   FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
                FORMAT_OPTIONS (    FIELD_TERMINATOR = '\t',
                                    FIRST_ROW = 2  
                                )
            )
GO
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE publicData
WITH (    LOCATION   = 'https://datalakegen2grupo11.blob.core.windows.net/datalakegen2grupo11/user/trusted-service-user/brutos' )
GO
*/
/*
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.userPublicData ( [id] VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2,

    [gender] VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2,

    [age] NUMERIC,

    [country]  VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2,

    [registered]  VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2 )

WITH ( LOCATION = 'userid-profile.tsv',
       DATA_SOURCE = [publicData],
       FILE_FORMAT = [TSV] )
*/

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT TSV2GB
       WITH (   FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
                FORMAT_OPTIONS (    FIELD_TERMINATOR = '\t',
                                    FIRST_ROW = 1 
                                )
            )

--drop EXTERNAL table [dbo].[canciones_usuarios];
--drop EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT TSV;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.canciones_usuarios2 ( 
    
    [ID] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1,1),

    [UsuarioID] VARCHAR (255) ,

    [FechaReproduccion] VARCHAR (255),

    [ArtistaID]  VARCHAR (255),

    [ArtistaNombre]  VARCHAR (255),

    [CancionID]  VARCHAR (255),

    [CancionNombre]  VARCHAR (255) )

WITH ( LOCATION = 'userid-timestamp-artid-artname-traid-traname.tsv',
       DATA_SOURCE = [publicData],
       FILE_FORMAT = [TSV2GB] )

       --crear un formato de archivo externo para que me acepte el tsv y formatee los datos al crear la tabla
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT TSV
       WITH (   FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
                FORMAT_OPTIONS (    FIELD_TERMINATOR = '\t',
                                    FIRST_ROW = 2  
                                )
            )



-- crear un origen de datos externo para que pueda acceder al fichero tsv
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE publicData
WITH (    LOCATION   = 'https://datalakegen2grupo11.blob.core.windows.net/datalakegen2grupo11/user/trusted-service-user/brutos' )



--crear una tabla externa desde un csv o tsv:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.userPublicData ( [id] VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2,



   [gender] VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2,



   [age] NUMERIC,



   [country]  VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2,



   [registered]  VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2 )



WITH ( LOCATION = 'userid-profile.tsv',
       DATA_SOURCE = [publicData],
       FILE_FORMAT = [TSV] )

IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'NYCTaxiTripSmall' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.userid_profile_test
    (
     [id] VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2,

    [gender] VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2,

    [age] NUMERIC,

    [country]  VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2,

    [registered]  VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2 )

WITH
    (
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
     CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
     -- HEAP
    )
GO

COPY INTO dbo.NYCTaxiTripSmall
(DateID 1, MedallionID 2, HackneyLicenseID 3, PickupTimeID 4, DropoffTimeID 5,
PickupGeographyID 6, DropoffGeographyID 7, PickupLatitude 8, PickupLongitude 9, 
PickupLatLong 10, DropoffLatitude 11, DropoffLongitude 12, DropoffLatLong 13, 
PassengerCount 14, TripDurationSeconds 15, TripDistanceMiles 16, PaymentType 17, 
FareAmount 18, SurchargeAmount 19, TaxAmount 20, TipAmount 21, TollsAmount 22, 
TotalAmount 23)
FROM 'https://contosolake.dfs.core.windows.net/users/NYCTripSmall.parquet'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
    ,MAXERRORS = 0
    ,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)

source:
COPY INTO Database1.usuarios
FROM 'https://datalakegen2grupo11.blob.core.windows.net/datalakegen2grupo11/user/trusted-service-user/brutos/userid-profile.tsv' [,...n]
WITH  
(
[FILE_TYPE = {'CSV'} ]
[,FILE_FORMAT = EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT OBJECT ]    
[,CREDENTIAL =(IDENTITY='Shared Access Signature', SECRET='sp=r&st=2022-11-10T15:26:31Z&se=2022-11-10T23:26:31Z&spr=https&sv=2021-06-08&sr=b&sig=gR9D7JYUKWnDvZqxedrCI3b6ND9tyhV4XYK0uW6eIaE%3D') ]
[,FIRSTROW = 2]
[,DATEFORMAT = 'date_format']
[,ENCODING = {'UTF8'}]

mssparkutils.fs.ls('hola')
mssparkutils.fs.ls('/')
mssparkutils.fs.mkdirs('hola')
mssparkutils.fs.head('brutos/userid-profile.tsv', 500)

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

# Azure storage access info
blob_account_name = 'r.cano' # replace with your blob name
blob_container_name = 'datalakegen2grupo11' # replace with your container name
blob_relative_path = 'Your path' # replace with your relative folder path
linked_service_name = 'AzureBlobStorage1' # replace with your linked service name
servername = "jdbc:sqlserver://practicabigdata.database.windows.net:1433"
dbname = "Practica"
url = servername + ";" + "databaseName=" + dbname + ";"
user = "practicabigdata" 
password = "BigData123"

#abfss://datalakegen2grupo11@f.campos.dfs.core.windows.net/userid-profile.tsv

blob_sas_token = mssparkutils.credentials.getConnectionStringOrCreds(linked_service_name)

# Allow SPARK to access from Blob remotely

wasb_path = 'datalakegen2grupo11@r.cano.dfs.core.windows.net/userid-profile.tsv' # % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name, blob_relative_path)

spark.conf.set('fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name), blob_sas_token)
print('Remote blob path: ' + wasb_path)

%%pyspark
"""configuracion de tabla maestra primer csv"""
df = spark.read.option("delimiter","\t").option("header","true").csv("brutos/userid-profile.tsv")
df = df.drop("gender").drop("age").withColumnRenamed("country","pais").withColumnRenamed("registered","registro")

dbtable = "Usuarios"

try:
  df.write \
    .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
    .mode("overwrite") \
    .option("url", url) \
    .option("dbtable", dbtable) \
    .option("user", user) \
    .option("password", password) \
    .save()
except ValueError as error :
    print("MSSQL Connector write failed", error)

print("MSSQL Connector write(overwrite) succeeded  ")

%%pyspark
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType,StructField, StringType, IntegerType

"""configuracion de tabla maestra segundo csv"""    
schema = StructType([ \
    StructField("id",StringType(),True), \
    StructField("timestamp",StringType(),True), \
    StructField("idArtista",StringType(),True), \
    StructField("nombreArtista", StringType(), True), \
    StructField("idCancion", StringType(), True), \
    StructField("nombreCancion", IntegerType(), True) \
  ])

df = spark.read.schema(schema).option("delimiter","\t").csv("brutos/userid-timestamp-artid-artname-traid-traname.tsv")
df = df.drop("timestamp")

dbtable = "UsuariosCanciones"

try:
  df.write \
    .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
    .mode("overwrite") \
    .option("url", url) \
    .option("dbtable", dbtable) \
    .option("user", user) \
    .option("password", password) \
    .save()
except ValueError as error :
    print("MSSQL Connector write failed", error)

print("MSSQL Connector write(overwrite) succeeded  ")

"""Modificacion y almancenamiento tablas: horoscopos, usuarios y paises para manejo en spark"""
from datetime import datetime
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType,StructField, StringType, IntegerType
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

tablaUsuarios = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "Usuarios") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()

tablaHoroscopos = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "horoscopos") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()

tablaPaises = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "paises") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()

tablaHoroscopos = tablaHoroscopos.withColumn("Desde", split(tablaHoroscopos['Fecha_rango'], " - ").getItem(0)).withColumn("Hasta", split(tablaHoroscopos['Fecha_rango'], " - ").getItem(1))

tablaUsuarios.show()
tablaHoroscopos.show()
tablaPaises.show()

"""Creacion tabla UsuariosHoroscopos"""
emptyRDD = spark.sparkContext.emptyRDD()

schema = StructType([
   StructField("idUsuario", StringType(), True),
   StructField("Signo", StringType(), True)])

usuariosHoroscopos = spark.createDataFrame(emptyRDD, schema)

for users in tablaUsuarios.collect():
    idUsuario = users["id"]
    for horos in tablaHoroscopos.collect():
        registro = users["registro"]
        if registro is not None:
            registro = registro.split(',')[0]
            registro = registro + " 2022"
            registro = datetime.strptime(registro, "%b %d %Y")

            desde = horos["Desde"]
            hasta =  horos["Hasta"]
            signo = horos["Signo"]

            desde = desde + " 2022"
            hasta = hasta + " 2022"

            desde = datetime.strptime(desde, "%b %d %Y")
            hasta = datetime.strptime(hasta, "%b %d %Y")

            if signo == "capricorn":
                desde = datetime.strptime(horos["Desde"] + " 2021", "%b %d %Y")
                if registro >= datetime.strptime("2022-12-22", "%Y-%M-%d"):
                    registro = users["registro"]
                    registro = registro.split(',')[0]
                    registro = datetime.strptime(registro + " 2021", "%b %d %Y")
     
            if desde <= registro <= hasta:
                print ("El usuario "+idUsuario+" con fecha de registró")
                print (registro)
                print(" está entre ")
                print (desde)
                print (hasta)
                print(" por tanto es "+signo)

                newRow = spark.createDataFrame([(idUsuario,signo)], ["idUsuario","Signo"])
                usuariosHoroscopos = usuariosHoroscopos.union(newRow)
                print ("\n")
                break;    
        else:
            print ("El usuario " + idUsuario + " no tiene fecha de registró por tanto es None")
            print ("\n")
            newRow = spark.createDataFrame([(idUsuario,"NoSigno")], ["idUsuario","Signo"])
            usuariosHoroscopos = usuariosHoroscopos.union(newRow)
            break;

try:
    usuariosHoroscopos.write \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "UsuariosHoroscopos") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password) \
        .save()
except ValueError as error :
    print("MSSQL Connector write failed", error)

print("MSSQL Connector write(overwrite) succeeded  ")

from datetime import datetime

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType,StructField, StringType, IntegerType

#from pyspark.sql.functions import col
import pyspark.sql.functions as F

servername = "jdbc:sqlserver://practicabigdata.database.windows.net:1433"

dbname = "Practica"

url = servername + ";" + "databaseName=" + dbname + ";"

user = "practicabigdata" 

password = "BigData123"

tablaUsuarios = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "Usuarios") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()



tablaHoroscopos = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "horoscopos") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()



tablaPaises = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "paises") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()






tablaUsuarios.show()

tablaHoroscopos.show()

tablaPaises.show()

tablaUsuarios = tablaUsuarios.withColumnRenamed("id","idUsuario")
tablaPaises = tablaPaises.withColumnRenamed("ID","idPaisContinente")





tablaUsuarios= tablaUsuarios.alias('a').join(tablaPaises.alias('b'),F.expr("a.pais like concat('%',b.nombre,'%') or b.nombre like concat('%',a.pais,'%')"),"left")
#tablaUsuarios= tablaUsuarios.alias('a').join(tablaPaises.alias('b'),F.expr("b.nombre like concat('%',a.pais,'%')"),"left")
tablaUsuarios.show()
tablaUsuarios = tablaUsuarios.drop("Nombre").drop("Continente").drop("pais").drop("registro")

tablaUsuarios.show()

#crear tabla UsuarioPaisContinente
try:

    tablaUsuarios.write \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "UsuarioPaisContinente") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password) \
        .save()

except ValueError as error :

    print("MSSQL Connector write failed", error)



print("MSSQL Connector write(overwrite) succeeded  ")

""" --Se necesita saber cuántos usuarios por país pertenecen a cada signo del horóscopo
select count(*) as users, p.nombre, uh.signo
from Usuarios u, dbo.paises p, dbo.UsuariosHoroscopos uh
where 	u.pais = p.nombre 
		and u.id = uh.idUsuario
		and u.pais = p.nombre
group by p.nombre, uh.signo
order by p.nombre
; 

select count(*) as users, p.nombre, uh.signo
from    dbo.UsuariosHoroscopos uh inner join dbo.Usuarios u on u.id = uh.idUsuario
        inner join dbo.paises p on u.pais = p.nombre 
group by p.nombre, uh.signo
order by p.nombre

"""
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

tablaUsuarios = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "Usuarios") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()

tablaPaises = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "paises") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()

tablaUsuariosHoroscopos = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "UsuariosHoroscopos") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()

#tablaUsuarioPaisHoroscopo= tablaUsuariosHoroscopos.alias('uh').join(tablaUsuarios.alias('u').join(tablaPaises.alias('b')))

#tablaUsuarioPaisHoroscopo.show()


######
#tablaUsuarioPaisHoroscopo.drop("Nombre").drop("Continente").drop("pais").drop("registro")

tablaUsuarios.createOrReplaceTempView("tablaUsuarios")
tablaPaises.createOrReplaceTempView("tablaPaises")
tablaUsuariosHoroscopos.createOrReplaceTempView("tablaUsuariosHoroscopos")

#tablaUsuarioPaisHoroscopo2 = spark.sql("select count(*) as users, p.nombre, uh.signo from tablaUsuariosHoroscopos uh inner join tablaUsuarios u on u.id = uh.idUsuario inner join tablaPaises p on u.pais = p.nombre group by p.nombre, uh.signo order by p.nombre ");

tablaUsuarioPaisHoroscopo2 = spark.sql("select count(*) as users, p.nombre, uh.signo from tablaUsuariosHoroscopos uh, tablaUsuarios u, tablaPaises p where uh.idUsuario = u.id and u.pais = p.nombre group by p.nombre, uh.signo order by p.nombre")
#spark.sql("select count(*) as users, p.nombre, uh.signo from dbo.Usuarios u, dbo.paises p, dbo.UsuariosHoroscopos uh where u.pais = p.nombre and u.id = uh.idUsuario and u.pais = p.nombre group by p.nombre, uh.signo order by p.nombre").show()

tablaUsuarioPaisHoroscopo2.show()
##########

"""
tablaUsuarioPaisHoroscopo.createOrReplaceTempView("tablaUsuarioPaisHoroscopo")
tablaUsuarioPaisHoroscopo = spark.sql("select count(*) as users, nombre, signo from tablaUsuarioPaisHoroscopo group by nombre, signo order by nombre")
tablaUsuarioPaisHoroscopo.show()

#crear tabla UsuarioPaisHoroscopo
try:

    tablaUsuarioPaisHoroscopo2.write \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "UsuarioPaisHoroscopo") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password) \
        .save()

except ValueError as error :

    print("MSSQL Connector write failed", error)



print("MSSQL Connector write(overwrite) succeeded  ")

""" --cuál es el signo que tiene más usuarios a nivel mundial 
select top(1) count(*) as users, uh.signo
from    dbo.UsuariosHoroscopos uh inner join dbo.Usuarios u on u.id = uh.idUsuario        
group by  uh.signo
order by users desc
"""
tablaUsuarios = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "Usuarios") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()

tablaUsuariosHoroscopos = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "UsuariosHoroscopos") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()


tablaUsuarios.createOrReplaceTempView("tablaUsuarios")
tablaUsuariosHoroscopos.createOrReplaceTempView("tablaUsuariosHoroscopos")

tablaHoroscopoMasUsado = spark.sql("select count(*) as users, uh.signo from tablaUsuariosHoroscopos uh inner join tablaUsuarios u on u.id = uh.idUsuario group by uh.signo order by users desc limit 1")

tablaHoroscopoMasUsado.show()

#crear tabla HoroscopoMasUsado
try:

    tablaHoroscopoMasUsado.write \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "HoroscopoMasUsado") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password) \
        .save()

except ValueError as error :

    print("MSSQL Connector write failed", error)



print("MSSQL Connector write(overwrite) succeeded  ")

"""
select top(1) count(*) as reproducciones, uc.nombreArtista, uh.signo
from dbo.UsuariosHoroscopos uh inner join dbo.Usuarios u on u.id = uh.idUsuario 
    inner join dbo.UsuariosCanciones uc on u.id = uc.id
WHERE uh.signo = (select signo from dbo.HoroscopoMasUsado)
group by  uc.nombreArtista, uh.signo
order by reproducciones desc
--limit 1 en payspark en vez de top

"""
tablaUsuarios = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "Usuarios") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()

tablaUsuariosHoroscopos = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "UsuariosHoroscopos") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()

tablaUsuariosCanciones = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "UsuariosCanciones") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()

tablaHoroscopoMasUsado = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "HoroscopoMasUsado") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()


tablaUsuarios.createOrReplaceTempView("Usuarios")
tablaUsuariosHoroscopos.createOrReplaceTempView("UsuariosHoroscopos")
tablaUsuariosCanciones.createOrReplaceTempView("UsuariosCanciones")
tablaHoroscopoMasUsado.createOrReplaceTempView("HoroscopoMasUsado")

tablaArtistaMasEscuchado = spark.sql("select count(*) as reproducciones, uc.nombreArtista, uh.signo from UsuariosHoroscopos uh inner join Usuarios u on u.id = uh.idUsuario inner join UsuariosCanciones uc on u.id = uc.id WHERE uh.signo = (select signo from HoroscopoMasUsado) group by  uc.nombreArtista, uh.signo order by reproducciones desc limit 1")

tablaArtistaMasEscuchado.show()

#crear tabla ArtistaMasEscuchado
try:

    tablaArtistaMasEscuchado.write \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "ArtistaMasEscuchado") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password) \
        .save()

except ValueError as error :

    print("MSSQL Connector write failed", error)



print("MSSQL Connector write(overwrite) succeeded  ")

"""
--	¿En qué continente deberían publicitar más la aplicación?  
-- reproducciones por pais y continente
select count(*) as reproducciones, p.nombre, p.Continente
from dbo.paises p inner join dbo.Usuarios u on p.nombre = u.pais inner join dbo.UsuariosCanciones uc on u.id = uc.id 
group by  p.nombre, p.Continente
order by reproducciones desc
"""
tablaUsuarios = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "Usuarios") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()

tablaPaises = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "paises") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()

tablaUsuariosCanciones = spark.read \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "UsuariosCanciones") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password).load()

tablaUsuarios.createOrReplaceTempView("Usuarios")
tablaUsuariosCanciones.createOrReplaceTempView("UsuariosCanciones")
tablaPaises.createOrReplaceTempView("paises")

tablaReproPaisContinente = spark.sql("select count(*) as reproducciones, p.nombre, p.Continente from paises p inner join Usuarios u on p.nombre = u.pais inner join UsuariosCanciones uc on u.id = uc.id group by  p.nombre, p.Continente order by reproducciones asc")

tablaReproPaisContinente.show()

"""
-- reproducciones por continente
select count(*) as reproducciones, p.Continente
from dbo.paises p inner join dbo.Usuarios u on p.nombre = u.pais inner join dbo.UsuariosCanciones uc on u.id = uc.id 
group by  p.Continente
order by reproducciones asc
"""

tablaReproContinente = spark.sql("select count(*) as reproducciones, p.Continente from paises p inner join Usuarios u on p.nombre = u.pais inner join UsuariosCanciones uc on u.id = uc.id group by  p.Continente order by reproducciones asc")

tablaReproContinente.show()

"""
--¿Hay algún continente que falte? 
-- falta el continente de British Indian Ocean Territory y el de Antarctica

select count(*) as reproducciones, p.nombre, p.Continente
from dbo.paises p inner join dbo.Usuarios u on p.nombre = u.pais inner join dbo.UsuariosCanciones uc on u.id = uc.id 
where p.Continente is null
group by  p.nombre, p.Continente
order by reproducciones asc
"""

tablaContinentesNull = spark.sql("select count(*) as reproducciones, p.nombre, p.Continente from paises p inner join Usuarios u on p.nombre = u.pais inner join UsuariosCanciones uc on u.id = uc.id where p.Continente is null group by p.nombre, p.Continente order by reproducciones asc")

tablaContinentesNull.show()

#crear tabla ReproPaisContinente
#crear tabla ReproContinente
#crear tabla ContinentesNull
try:

    tablaReproPaisContinente.write \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "ReproPaisContinente") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password) \
        .save()
    
    tablaReproContinente.write \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "ReproContinente") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password) \
        .save()
    
    tablaContinentesNull.write \
        .format("com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.spark") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .option("url", url) \
        .option("dbtable", "ContinentesNull") \
        .option("user", user) \
        .option("password", password) \
        .save()

except ValueError as error :

    print("MSSQL Connector write failed", error)



print("MSSQL Connector write(overwrite) succeeded  ")
